ygData.subject: RE: items site?
ygData.msgSnippet: If anyone would make a true warrior only site, I would be willing to help by submitting anything i have for knowledge and information.  I am a proud warrior of
ygData.messageBody:
If anyone would make a true warrior only site, I would be willing to help by
submitting anything i have for knowledge and information. I am a proud
warrior of the 40th season on the Quellious plane. I have seen much, and
know many of the things young warriors can use to get started. I havent
much time to devote to doing a site myself, but I can help with some
submitions. Much of what was stated concerning best prices, best equipment
for the warriors level, and other such information as well as a true
"handbook" for the warrior would be a great assest to the warrior community.
I have looked through every class specific site i can find, and only one
warrior site have i seen. Would be good to have a little competition to get
more information out to us all.

Daks
Stormriders of Quellious
-----Original Message-----
From: Trent Carroll [mailto:trent@...]
Sent: Sunday, October 17, 1999 10:16 AM
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
Subject: [warriors_eq] items site?


Wow, this email list still lives!

I've got a question for you. Do you use a site to see what items are
available? Which one? How could it be better? Do you care about news on
an items site, or just the items? Would it need quests listed for quest for
items, entirely, or just starting point? List of Mob it comes from?

My reason for asking: I'm thinking about making one, and if I do, I want
it to be THE items site to go to. I've actually already got the database
designed, I just need to work on inputting info and designing the site
layout. I could have a preview(not all items) up in 2 days or less if I get
enough response.
-----Original Message-----
From: suzkim@... [mailto:suzkim@...]
Sent: Sunday, October 17, 1999 5:24 AM
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] One hand or two?


Matt-
I have a 30th level barbarian warrior on Veeshan. I can only tell you
what I've chosen
Max out 1hs, 2hs, taunt, kick, slam/bash and I am working on archery
(this has helped me take down runners).

Some have said take up piercing. When you get duel attack and duel weild
only for the fact that a piercing weapon is faster and will help max these
skills out.

I find that 1hs with duel weild is more effective in certain
circumstances and then 2hs in another. 1hs gives you speed of attack. 2hs is
good for greatest impact (recently got a crit hit of 100.. now that was
sweet). If you use a 2hs or 1hs will also depend on your group make up. I do
carry all my weapons with me so at times will switch depending on the
circumstance.

All my reading and such have said to keep both maxed out. Some reasons
are the performance of the weapon others for the variety of weapons you can
use. I didn't work on my 2hs until I was at the 28th level and it was very
painful to max it out.

Good luck!

Az

Matthew Horne wrote:

G'day my name is Kalroth.. a level 7 dwarf warrior on the solusek ro
serverMy question is whether one hand or two hand slash is better for a
warrior Hope you can help me , thanks
